subject: Re: [junit] DOubt in installation
msgSnippet: You should post this question on the cactus-user mailing list (see http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus/mailinglist.html). However you should read the
messageBody:
You should post this question on the cactus-user mailing list (see
http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus/mailinglist.html). However you
should read the Getting Started guide before posting (available on the web
site) as this error is clearly explained there.

Thanks
-Vincent

----- Original Message -----
From: "Ajith Ittan" <ajith_ittan@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 3:57 PM
Subject: [junit] DOubt in installation

ent.java:82)
